title: Warning or automatic correction the parameter of ether()

body:
This is not an issue with the helper, but with floating point representation: JavaScript's floating point numbers are not large enough to correctly store 0.123456789012345678, so even if we converted to string you woulnd't get the correct result. 

You can verify this by running `node` and typing the number, or opening the browser dev tools, and typing `console.log(0.123456789012345678)`.
